description.value:
School transmutation; Level alchemist 1, antipaladin 1, druid 1, hunter 1, magus 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, summoner 1, unchained Summoner 1, witch 1;

Casting Time 1 standard action
Components V, S

Range personal
Targets your tail
Duration 1 hour/level

Description

When attacking with your tail or tail weapons, you gain 5 feet of reach, a +1 bonus on attack rolls, and a +2 bonus on damage rolls.

data.shortDescription: When attacking with your tail or tail weapons, you gain 5 feet of reach, a +1 bonus on attack rolls, and a +2 bonus on damage rolls.
